CustomField.description: Use this action if the signer is in the same physical location as a DocuSign user who will act as a Signing Host for the transaction. This recipient type can only be used if enabled for this DocuSign account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this action if the signer is in the same physical location as a DocuSign user who will act as a Signing Host for the transaction. This recipient type can only be used if enabled for this DocuSign account.
CustomField.label: In-Person Signers
